author: smuzaffar
body: Latest dasgoclient changed json output which broke `das-selected-lumis.py` ( see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37052 ). This PR adds unit test to run `das-selected-lumis.py` to to make sure that it can properly read `dasgoclient` json output.
title: added unit test for das-selected-lumis.py
